title: "Deep learning for the fully automated segmentation of the inner ear on MRI"
excerpt: "The inner ear, also known as the labyrinth, is a complex structure located in the temporal bone. It roughly consists of the cochlea, the vestibule, and the semi-circular canals. Understanding changes and variations within these structures can help diagnose and predict a number of conditions 1,"
